Name: The National Institute of Dramatic Art (NIDA)

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available by mail. Copying services for original records to A3 and newspapers.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to training of actors, technicians, designers and directors in Australia for the past 35 years. (70% in-house).

About.Major holdings: National Institute of Dramatic Art: Records. The Old Tote Theatre Company: Records. Robert Quentin: Records 1917-1979.
